title: Siru Nadai Thooramum Lyrics Urumeen
stanzas:
Siru nadai dhooramum
unnodu naan vandhen
Sillendra un paarvai
pada kaathirunthaen

Avvalavu azhagaai
anbe nee irundhaai
Aiyaiyo aiyo naanum
enna seiven

Ho evvalavu dhooram
nadappaai thaniye
Yaen indha mounam
en kanmaniye

Un viralodu viral korthu
Naan vara vendum thunaiye

Oru nodiyil kadanthen anbe ivviravai
En uyiril vaiththaen un uravai uravai

Naan unathaanen
ena eppadi solven
En anbaale unai
velven velven

Ho evvalavu dhooram
nadappaai thaniye
Yaen indha mounam
en kanmaniye

Un viralodu viral korthu
Naan vara vendum thunaiye

seo.title: Siru Nadai Thooramum Lyrics Urumeen
seo.description: Get the complete Siru Nadai Thooramum Lyrics Urumeen from Urumeen. Read the lyrics penned by Kavin and composed by Achu Rajamani and sung by Karthik. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Kavin, Urumeen, Achu Rajamani, Karthik, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
